apple_vendor_description: This romantic emoji on Apple devices depicts a loving embrace between a woman and a man, with skin tones rendered in a harmonious dark and medium-dark range, reflecting Apple's commitment to diverse representation. The couple's faces are softly angled towards each other, with subtle rosy cheeks that enhance the warmth of the moment, all brought to life with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading. It beautifully conveys affection, romance, and the sweet intimacy of a kiss, offering a tender visual on Apple devices.
